main.title: musi Openpon (ALPHA)
main.join_discord: o tawa kulupu mi lon ilo Siko a!

help_modal.action_attack_altclick: (ilo luka soto li open e lipu ken la) o utala
help_modal.action_emote: o open e lipu pi tawa musi
help_modal.action_ratio_change: o suli anu lili e nanpa utala
help_modal.action_reset_gfx: o pini e ante tawa sitelen
help_modal.ui_leaderboard_desc: lipu pi jan utala li pana e sona ni pi jan utala wawa: nimi en suli ma en mani.
help_modal.ui_control_desc: ilo pi ken ante li jo e ni:
help_modal.ui_pop: nanpa - nanpa jan sina en nanpa jan suli nanpa wan en wawa pi kama ona.
help_modal.ui_gold: mani - mani sina en wawa pi kama ona.
help_modal.ui_troops_workers: kulupu utala en kulupu pali - nanpa pi kulupu utala en nanpa pi kulupu pali. kulupu utala li utala li awen tan pakala. kulupu pali li kama jo e mani. sina ken ante e nanpa ni kepeken sike tawa.
help_modal.ui_attack_ratio: nanpa utala - sina utala kepeken kulupu utala la suli ona li nanpa ni. sina ken ante e nanpa ni kepeken sike tawa. kulupu awen li suli la sina weka lili e kulupu sina, taso ona li lili la kulupu sina li pakala suli. nanpa li suli tan nanpa 2:1 la ijo ni li ante ala.
help_modal.option_pause: o pini anu awen e musi - ni li ken lon taso musi pi jan wan.
help_modal.option_settings: ken - o open e lipu ken. sina ken ante e ante lukin e sitelen pimeja e sitelen Emosi e pali pi ilo luka soto lon ni.
help_modal.radial_desc: ilo luka teje (anu luka) li open e sike ken. ni la sina ken ni:
help_modal.radial_boat: o tawa e tomo tawa telo tawa utala lon ma pi wile sina (sina ken tawa telo la ni taso la sina ken).
help_modal.info_enemy_desc: lipu sona li jo e sona ni pi jan musi: nimi en mani en nanpa pi kulupu utala en jan ike ala ike. jan li ike e jan pona ona la ona li jan ike. sitelen ni li ken pali:
help_modal.info_target: o sitelen e jan musi tawa jan pona sina ale. sina ken utala kulupu kepeken ni.
help_modal.info_alliance: o alasa pona pi jan musi. jan pona li ken pana e ijo tawa ona ante, taso ona li ken ala utala e ona ante.
help_modal.info_emoji: o toki e sitelen Emosi tawa jan musi.
help_modal.info_ally_desc: sina kama pona jan la sitelen sin ni li kama:
help_modal.ally_betray: o utala e jan pona sina o pini e pona. ni la sitelen li lon poka pi nimi sina, taso kulupu ante kin li ike la lon ala. utala tawa sina li ike lili tawa kulupu utala. ken lili la ilo li pona e sina. jan o pona ala e sina.
help_modal.ally_donate: o pana e kulupu utala sina tawa jan pona sina. ona li jo lili e kulupu la, kulupu utala li utala e ona la, ona li wile e wawa tawa kulupu utala la, ni ale la sina ken kepeken ni.
help_modal.build_city_desc: ma tomo li suli e nanpa jan suli nanpa wan sina. sina ken ala suli e ma sina la sina lon poka pi nanpa jan suli nanpa wan la ni tu la ni li pona.
help_modal.build_defense_desc: tomo awen li suli e awen lon linja poka. utala kama li kama lili li moli suli e kulupu ona.
help_modal.build_port_desc: tomo pi tomo tawa telo li pana e tomo tawa telo esun tawa ma ante (taso sina anu ona li kepeken ken „Äåo pini e esun„Äç). ni li pana e mani tawa kulupu tu. ni la ni li ken e pali pi tomo tawa telo utala. ni li ken lon poka telo taso.
help_modal.build_warship_desc: tomo tawa telo utala li tawa sike li pini e tomo tawa telo esun li pakala e tomo tawa telo pi kulupu utala. ona li kama tan tomo pi tomo tawa telo nanpa wan li tawa lon telo pi wile sina. sina ken tawa e tomo tawa telo utala kepeken ilo luka utala sina lon ona lon telo sin.
help_modal.build_silo: tomo pi ilo pi pakala wawa
help_modal.build_silo_desc: tomo pi ilo pi pakala wawa li pana e ilo pi pakala wawa.
help_modal.build_sam: ilo tawa pi ilo sewi pi pakala wawa
help_modal.build_sam_desc: ken kipisi MMMLLL la ni li ken pini e ilo pi pakala wawa pi kulupu utala lon sike ona pi ijo sitelen wan ale. ilo sewi pi pakala wawa li kama sin lon tenpo lili luka tu ala luka li ken ala pini e ilo pi pakala wawa mute.
help_modal.build_atom: ilo pi pakala wawa pi kipisi ijo
help_modal.build_atom_desc: ilo lili ni pi pakala wawa li pakala e ma e tomo e tomo tawa telo. ona li kama tan tomo pi ilo pi pakala wawa nanpa wan li tawa ma pi pali ona.
help_modal.build_hydrogen: ilo pi pakala wawa pi wan ijo
help_modal.build_hydrogen_desc: ilo suli pi pakala wawa. ona li kama tan tomo pi ilo pi pakala wawa nanpa wan li tawa ma pi pali ona.
help_modal.build_mirv_desc: ilo wawa nanpa wan pi pakala wawa. ona li tu tawa ilo lili tawa ma suli. ona li pakala e jan musi pi wile sina taso. ona li kama tan tomo pi ilo pi pakala wawa nanpa wan li tawa ma pi pali ona.
help_modal.icon_desc: ni li sitelen lon musi li sona ona:
help_modal.icon_crown: len lawa pi jan lawa - ni li jan musi nanpa wan.
help_modal.icon_traitor: sitelen utala - jan ike. jan musi ni li utala e jan pona ona.
help_modal.icon_ally: luka tu - jan pona. jan musi ni li jan pona sina.

single_modal.title: jan musi wan
single_modal.infinite_troops: o jo e kulupu utala ale
single_modal.disable_nukes: o pini e ilo pi pakala wawa

private_lobby.title: o kama tawa tomo len
private_lobby.not_found: ilo li alasa ala e tomo. o lukin e nanpa tomo o alasa sin.
private_lobby.error: ijo li pakala. o alasa sin.
private_lobby.joined_waiting: sina kama! musi li awen tawa open...

username.invalid_chars: nimi o jo taso e ijo nimi e nanpa e ala e linja e [poki nimi leko].

host_modal.title: tomo len
host_modal.infinite_troops: o jo e kulupu utala ale
host_modal.waiting: tomo li awen tawa jan musi...

game_starting_modal.title: musi li open...
game_starting_modal.desc: tomo li kama open. o awen.

unit_type.missile_silo: tomo pi ilo pi pakala wawa
unit_type.sam_launcher: ilo tawa pi ilo sewi pi pakala wawa
unit_type.atom_bomb: ilo pi pakala wawa pi kipisi ijo
unit_type.hydrogen_bomb: ilo pi pakala wawa pi wan ijo

user_setting.title: ken pi jan musi
user_setting.dark_mode_desc: o ante e kule sitelen tawa walo tawa pimeja
user_setting.emojis_desc: o ante e lon pi sitelen Emosi
user_setting.anonymous_names_desc: o len e nimi lon pi jan musi kepeken nimi nasa lon musi sina
user_setting.left_click_label: üñ±Ô∏è ilo luka soto li open e lipu ken
user_setting.left_click_desc: ni li lon la ilo luka soto li open e lipu ken la ilo luka utala li utala. ni li pini la ilo luka soto li utala taso.
user_setting.attack_ratio_desc: sina utala kepeken kulupu utala la o pana e kulupu suli ni (kipisi wan tawa wan ale)
user_setting.troop_ratio_desc: o ante e suli pi kulupu utala (tawa utala) e suli pi kulupu pali (tawa mani) (kipisi wan tawa wan ale)
user_setting.easter_writing_speed_desc: o ante e wawa pi sitelen ilo powe sina (wan tawa wan ale)
user_setting.easter_bug_count_desc: pakala ilo pi nanpa ni li pona tawa sina (pilin la, ala tawa luka luka ale)
user_setting.zoom_out_desc: o lukin suli e sitelen ma
user_setting.zoom_in_desc: o lukin lili e sitelen ma

help.troops: o pana e kulupu utala tawa mi a!
help.gold: o pana e mani tawa mi a!
help.no_attack: o utala ala e mi a!
help.sorry_attack: mi pakala li wile ala utala.
help.help_defend: mi o awen tan [P1] la o pona e mi a!

attack.mirv: o pana e ilo pi pakala wawa mute tawa [P1] a!

greet.oops: mi pakala li toki powe a!
greet.trust_me: mi pona tawa sina. lon a!
greet.trust_broken: mi la sina pona tawa mi...

misc.pr: tenpo seme la wile mi pi sitelen ilo sin li kama...?

warnings.mirv_soon: tenpo kama lili la [P1] li ken pana e ilo pi pakala wawa mute a!
warnings.number1_warning: mi wan ala la tenpo kama lili la jan musi nanpa wan li sewi a!
warnings.stalemate: mi tu o pona. utala ni li sama, mi tu li anpa.
warnings.has_allies: [P1] li jo e jan pona mute.
warnings.no_allies: [P1] li jo ala e jan pona.
warnings.betrayed: [P1] li utala e jan pona ona a!
warnings.saving_for_mirv: [P1] li awen tawa ilo pi pakala wawa mute.
warnings.mirv_ready: [P1] li jo e mani tawa ilo pi pakala wawa mute a!
